name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a seasoned Automation Engineer with over 8 years of software engineering experience, I excel in automating processes using **PowerShell**, **Bash**, and **Ansible**. I am proficient in managing **Microsoft Active Directory**, **Microsoft 365**, and **Windows Server**, ensuring robust automation and system management solutions. My expertise in **Terraform** and **DSC** enables the provisioning and configuration of cloud resources effectively, particularly within **Azure** environments. Additionally, I leverage **Git** for version control to maintain high-quality code. My strong background in Python development (FastAPI, Django, Flask) supports my ability to build reliable automation scripts that integrate seamlessly with existing infrastructures. I am committed to optimizing workflows and enhancing system performance in dynamic environments.
